channel.title: CVE Feed for ipfs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ipfs -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-11059|2024-08-04T11:21:14.488Z -- ipfs -- aegir
item.description: In AEgir greater than or equal to 21.7.0 and less than 21.10.1, aegir publish and aegir build may leak secrets from environment variables in the browser bundle published to npm. This has been fixed in 21.10.1.
